Best Grill Cover To Keep Your Unit Protected At All Times

November 18, 2018May 18, 2018 by Jack Thompson
10shares
  • Facebook
  • Pinterest10
  • Twitter
  • Google+

Are you tired of moving your barbecue or grill around? Or you have already chosen a fixed place onto your lawn for it. Do not tire yourself out since we will review the best BBQ grill covers for you so as to make your life easier and grant you a better understanding of the pros and cons before making your choice.

Imagine that you have a big grill or barbecue equipment and like most families, you like to enjoy every weekend making BBQs or smoked meat. However the issue is that your equipment is pretty heavy and you’d rather have it in a fix place rather than moving it from the garage to the lawn every time.

This may cause it to wear and break as well as shorten its lifespan. Now you may have heard of outdoor grill covers and want to get one but don’t know which one to choose from the various brands. Do not worry, we’ll go through the best grill covers for you and make sure you have an easy choice.

So, here you go:

# Product Name Dimensions (in) Weight Price
1 Homitt Gas Grill Cover 16.9 x 1.6 x 11.8 1.57 poundsCheck price
2 Grillman Premium (58 Inch) BBQ Grill Cover 11 x 8 x 4 2.82 poundsCheck price
3 VicTsing 3-4 Burner Gas Grill Cover 10.2 x 1.6 x 15.8 3.6 poundsCheck price
4 Classic Accessories 73912 Veranda Grill Cover 59 x 24 x 46 4.4 poundsCheck price
5 Char Broil All-Season Grill Cover 24 x 62 x 42 3.6 poundsCheck price

Why a Grill Cover is So Essential for Your BBQ Grill?

A grill cover is a necessity nowadays if you have any type of grill since the cover will protect it from most kinds of external dangers (weather). As a result, the cover will extend the life of your grill.

Grill covers protect your grill from moist air that can damage most grills that are made up of iron. The moisture along with oxygen in the atmosphere and from the heat of your cooking will get your grill to start rusting.

By wrapping your grill in a good grill cover material will protect it as well as increase its efficiency and durability meaning it is always in top shape and ready to be used throughout the month or year. It also saves your time from moving your appliance from inside to outside repeatedly which might make it wear faster.

As a result, it does save you a good amount of money since your grill will remain functional longer with the use of a cover.

Reviews of the Best Grill Covers for 2018

1. Homitt Gas Grill Cover

This one comes from a leading manufacturer and is one of the best in terms of waterproof grill covers. It can be used as a cover for Weber genesis, Brinkmann and Jenn Air, making it more convenient for you.

Being made of high-end oxford fabric, it is pretty much of very high quality. This enables it to protect the grill against all type of weather such as wind, hail, heat and cold. In addition to that, it also offers protection against insects.

The strong handles as well as the Velcro straps are provided to give additional protection for the grill.
The features that makes it stand out are that it is compatible with most brands of grills. The high quality fabric makes it durable as it offers protection against weather (waterproof) and insects.

The only problem with this is that the color can fade with exposure, making it look not so good over the time.

Pros

  • Strong handles and compatible with grill brands
  • Easy to install and additional Velcro straps
  • Durable and waterproof

Cons

  • Possible to be affected by rust
  • The colors fade when exposed to too much sun
Check Price on Amazon

2. Grillman Premium (58 Inch) BBQ Grill Cover

This unit comes from a brand that is well known for its grilling, gas grill cover and BBQ appliances.

This one is considered to be the best grill cover for Weber Spirit, CharBroil and so on. Like most popular brands, it is made up in PVC lined up Oxford material, meaning it is waterproof.

As an added benefit, it is UV and tear resistant. Also wind resistant, it has Velcro straps attached that can be fastened as needed to resist windy days.

It is pretty easy to set up and the directions are straightforward as well.
There are a few features that make it one of the best grill covers as it has PVC lined up Oxford material, which makes it much stronger against rain and tear. It does seem to not absorb the sun heat that much either.

The Velcro straps are pretty well placed and easy to use. Now let’s review the pros and cons we have found while testing it.

Pros

  • Solid and large-sized
  • It is competitively priced

Cons

  • Lacks consistency in quality
Check Price on Amazon

3. VicTsing 3-4 Burner Gas Grill Cover

This particular grill cover is a heavy duty one. Designed to fit up to 4 burners, the cover fits most other brands like Jenn Air, Char Broil and so on.

It is made of hydrophobic material with the edge bound together for greater BBQ protection. It is also waterproof like most brand offers and resistant to UV.

It is advertised as being able to protect from most forces of the nature such as heavy rain, sun, wind etc. It is also one of the best grill covers for winter.

The feature that makes it one of the popular grill covers out there are the Velcro Straps that help fasten the cover when needed (windy weather). It is pretty easy to clean simply with water and the dirt will wash off and has a stable cover (fastened). It is also made from heavy duty material.

If you use it like it’s meant to be used, it can be a pretty solid equipment prepared to brave even the worst winds and rain. You just have to use the Velcro Straps well and make sure to fasten them enough. Overall, the tool does all that it promises to do.

Pros

  • Easy to wash and clean
  • Comes with effective Velcro straps
  • Made of durable material

Cons

  • Inconsistency in quality
  • The Velcro Strap in the bottom is difficult to fasten
Check Price on Amazon

4. Classic Accessories Veranda Grill Cover

This particular grill cover is designed in heavy duty material, bound by high density of stitching and padded handles for the comfort of carrying. All of these make it a pretty good grill cover to consider.

Like most other grill covers, it does cover other brands of grill like Weber, Genesis and so on. The top is waterproof as the fabric is made of Gardelle. The one drawback though is that it is not designed to cover the entire of the wheels or legs on some models.

Some of the main features of it are that it can be used to cover most brands. It is made in heavy duty material and has a waterproof top.

The veranda grill also has handles for comfort and high density stitching for durability. Despite some of the drawbacks, like not covering the bottom of the grill, it is pretty much a good cover.

Now that we know what makes it different from the other types of grill covers, we can see what advantages and disadvantages it has compared to the others.

Pros

  • Durable and waterproof
  • Made of heavy duty material
  • Additional stitching to reinforce the cover

Cons

  • Not designed to cover the entire of the wheels or legs
  • Lacks Velcro straps to protect from bad weather
  • Gets dirty and stained easily
Check Price on Amazon

5. Char Broil All-Season Grill Cover

With this one, your grill will last longer thanks to the great cover it is. It is mostly designed to hold 3-4 burners and is advertised as resisting all season.

In addition it has a polyester shield which helps in the waterproofing. This particular grill cover is pretty spacious at 62 inches wide and like most respectable covers, it is made from heavy duty material.

The straps are adjustable for more secure fit. As an added benefit, the color of the cover does not fade from intense UV exposure.

The best thing about this cover is that it can fit a lot of types of grills from charcoal, wood, gas and more. As you might have guessed, it supports other brands of grills like Weber, Jenn Air and so on also.

The features that make it interesting are firstly that the color does not fade when exposed to the sun which is a plus compared to other types of covers. Next is that it is also one of the most spacious covers you will find and could probably fit two small grills.

This grill cover is made of heavy duty material meaning it doesn’t break or tear that easily. There are adjustable straps available for more secure fit meaning it can brave strong winds and bad weather.

The roof is made of polyester – and so is waterproof.
For the space it has, it’s probably one of the few you find on the market. Most are made only for one grill, but this one can probably fit more although might be a bit tight.

Pros

  • Do not fade when exposed to the Sun
  • Adjustable straps are always helpful
  • Solid and durable

Cons

  • Inconsistency in quality
Check Price on Amazon

To Sum Up

After taking our time and reviewing all the grill covers above, we finally came to our conclusion.

Now all of the grill covers above does the jobs that they advertise to some extent. But if you are really planning to go long term on it, you have to make sure that there is no compromise with the features.

So what is the top rated grill cover? Well the winner is definitely the Homitt Gas Grill Cover.

The built of this grill cover is rather sturdy. It is also pretty affordable and will hardly disappoint in providing the desired protection to your BBQ unit.
